citation: Proclamation under the Gas Safety Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Gas Safety Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Gas Safety Act 2019 fix 3 February 2021 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

27 January 2021

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Building and Construction

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 3 February 2021

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
